metadata.title: CVE-2021-34550 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Tor before 0.4.6.5, aka TROVE-2021-006. The v3 onion service descriptor parsing allows out-of-bounds memory access, and a client crash, via a crafted onion service descriptor

criterions.comment: tor package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
